<title level="1" pfs="Limited">[Beaver](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1771)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

A typical beaver can grow up to 4 feet long and weigh up to 65 pounds.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 13

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 8
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature -1">[Beaver](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1771)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #176: Lost Mammoth Valley](/Sources.aspx?ID=113) pg. 82</row>

**Perception** +6; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33) (imprecise) 30 feet

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +3, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +2, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +4

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +1

**Dex** +2

**Con** +3

**Int** -4

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Deep Breath** A beaver can [hold its breath](/Rules.aspx?ID=468) for 15 minutes.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 15 

**Fort** +7 

**Ref** +4 

**Will** +4 

</row>

**HP** 8

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 15 feet, swim 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +6,
**Damage** 1d6+1 piercing

**Construct Shelter**   The beaver takes 1 minute to rapidly construct a simple mound along one side of its space, which can be used to [Take Cover](/Actions.aspx?ID=90).

**Penetrating Bite** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The beaver makes a jaws Strike. The Strike ignores the first 5 Hardness of organic materials, such as rope, leather, and wood.

**Prop** <actions string="Single Action" />  The beaver stabilizes itself with its tail, gaining a +1 circumstance bonus to its Fortitude and Reflex DCs against [Shove](/Actions.aspx?ID=38) and [Trip](/Actions.aspx?ID=40) attempts until it next takes an action with the [move](/Traits.aspx?ID=114) trait.

</column>
